pages.text: $(li)The Enchanter will give you or near $(l:patchouli:villagers/villager)Villagers$(/l) the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/slowness)Slowness Potion effect$(/l), reducing the movement speed.$(br)$(li)It will give the $(l:patchouli:potions/vanilla/strength)Strength Potion effect$(/l) to nearby Illagers too, making them inflict more damage.$(br)$(li)On death they may drop $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/leather)Leather$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/gold_nugget)Gold Nuggets$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/emerald)Emeralds$(/l), or $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/diamond)Diamonds$(/l).
$(br)The Enchanters are unable to attack you or other creatures.
